thread.section_title: First Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Don't waste your money or time.
thread.title_full: Don't waste your money or time. - Review of First Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Roy H
title: Don't waste your money or time.
text:
Hotel was unwelcoming, and couldn't even accommodate simple needs such as extra pillows. The hotel room was cramped for being a suite and pull out bed was broken and lumpy. The bed was uncomfortable and not to comfort standard. Lobby area was decent, but the staff was completely unhelpful and couldn't even have the patience to explain where to park without having a attitude when asking a simple question.
Room Tip: Don't book it. See more room tips
